data.message: Praying this message gets out to Face Book, for the last 24 hours, I cannot post, share, chat and cannot post from my cel phone, my profile picture is in wrong place which I think has something to do with problem, Face Book Please Help!!!!!!

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Jen. Could you tell us a little more about the problem you're experiencing? -Jessica

I noticed later that you didn't get the message because of the problem I was having so I went straight to Face book, praying that you got it and you did, you fixed the whole problem, thanks again and may God give you a special blessing for now I am able to spread Gods messages on my page, blessings to Face Book!!!
they responded to you but somehow strolled on by me .
